Katya: Aff. I am not a scientist, but I think that if we are able to 
control it in some ways, we might produce energy enough to power the 
whole base, and maybe build around it.

A small door at the back of her neck opens, revealing what had once 
been a cockpit, but was now much too small to accomodate anyone. She 
places the piece of energon carefull in it.

Katya: Do we go back to base or do we need to investigate some more 
over here?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Owlhawk:  Yes that's a good idea.  It seems to magnify
> and de-magnify energon radiaation in random amount. 
> If we could cause it to constantly magnify it we might
> produce energy more effeciently.
>
